headline: The Worst-Played Hand in Politics Today
author: Erick Erickson
sentences: Kemp just scored tax cuts and budget surplus rebates for voters; pay raises for teachers; permitless gun carry for the Second Amendment crowd; transgender sports regulations, curriculum transparency, and mask mandate bans for parents; an expansion of Georgia's school choice scholarship for students; and liability and nuisance protection for farmers.
